allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add BidFax connector for auction vehicle scraping

Implements dedicated BidFax connector with full control:
- Multi-page discovery \(10 listings per page\)
- Automatic pagination support \(discovers across multiple pages\)
- Live progress tracking during discovery
- Customizable max URLs \(including "all" option via UI\)
- Complete vehicle data extraction \(price, VIN, auction, condition, damage, mileage, etc.\)
- CSV export functionality
- Test/preview parsing before job creation

Backend:
- backend/app/services/bidfax_connector.py - Dedicated service with discovery, parsing, CSV export
- backend/app/api/v1/admin_bidfax.py - API endpoints for discover, create-jobs, parse, export
- backend/app/api/router.py - Register BidFax router at /admin/connectors/bidfax

Frontend:
- frontend/src/app/admin/connectors/bidfax/page.tsx - Full UI with discovery, selection, job creation
- frontend/src/lib/api-client.ts - BidFax API client functions

Features:
- Discover URLs from category pages with pagination
- Shows found count and pages scraped
- Select individual URLs or select all
- Create jobs for selected URLs
- Parse single URL for preview \(no job created\)
- View scraped vehicles table
- Export all to CSV
- Domain policy integration \(shows bidfax.info policy\)

Access: /admin/connectors/bidfax

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add proxy debugging and improve BidFax configuration

Debugging improvements:
- Add debug logging for Playwright proxy configuration
- Add proxy URL parse logging in proxy_manager
- Log proxy server and username length for troubleshooting

SmartProxy configuration:
- Configured SmartProxy credentials \(proxy.smartproxy.net:3120\)
- Proxy connection successful from Docker containers
- Both curl and Docker container can reach proxy

BidFax domain policy improvements:
- Updated user agent to full Chrome string
- Increased request delay to 3000ms
- Enabled proxy usage

Current status:
- Proxy connects successfully âœ“
- Requests reach BidFax through proxy âœ“
- BidFax blocks with Cloudflare protection \(requires anti-detection\)

Files modified:
- backend/app/scraper.py - Added Playwright proxy debug logging
- backend/app/services/proxy_manager.py - Added proxy URL parse logging
- Domain policy updated via API for en.bidfax.info

Next: Implement Cloudflare bypass strategies

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement comprehensive anti-detection for Cloudflare bypass

Anti-detection features implemented:
- Playwright Stealth plugin integration
- Browser fingerprint randomization
- Custom JavaScript injection to hide automation
- Extended wait times for Cloudflare challenges
- Automatic Cloudflare challenge detection

New dependencies:
- playwright-stealth==1.0.6
- fake-useragent==1.4.0

New service: stealth_browser.py
- Random viewport generation \(5 common resolutions\)
- Random user agent rotation \(4 Chrome variants\)
- Random timezone and locale spoofing
- Geolocation permission mocking
- Additional Chromium args for anti-detection
- Navigator properties override \(plugins, webdriver, languages\)

Enhanced scraper.py:
- Added use_stealth parameter to _fetch_playwright_with_proxy
- Browser launch with anti-detection arguments
- Context creation with randomized fingerprint
- Stealth async application \(playwright-stealth\)
- Custom JavaScript injection
- Network idle wait strategy
- Cloudflare challenge detection and extended wait \(8+ seconds\)

Current status with BidFax:
- Proxy: âœ“ Working \(SmartProxy residential\)
- Stealth: âœ“ Applied successfully
- Fingerprinting: âœ“ Randomized
- Challenge detection: âœ“ Detecting Cloudflare
- Result: âœ— Still blocked \(BidFax uses Cloudflare Turnstile/CAPTCHA\)

BidFax has very aggressive Cloudflare protection that may require:
- CAPTCHA solving services
- Residential proxies with longer session persistence
- More advanced anti-detection \(e.g., puppeteer-extra plugins\)
- Or legitimate API access from BidFax

The infrastructure is ready for sites with moderate bot protection.

EOF
\)")
